articles.description: The FAA is giving the Boeing 737 Max jets the green light. However, many are worried that the changes are not enough.
articles.content: After two deadly crashes that took 346 lives and a worldwide grounding that lasted almost two years, the Federal Aviation Administration and regulators across the world are giving the Boeing 737 Max … [+2129 chars]
